item.title: Update Jvm Version in Mac
item.description: Being a newbie for Clojure, the problem I met when trying to use its other core library - clojure.core.reducers is the “namespace not found…”. (require '[clojure.core.reducers :as r]) Get this: clojure.lang.Compiler$CompilerException: java.lang.Exception: namespace ‘clojure.core.reducers’ not found, compiling: … … … Caused by: java.lang.Exception: namespace ‘clojure.core.reducers’ not found From the docs, (ns ^{:doc "A library for reduction and parallel folding. Alpha and subject to change. Note that fold and its derivatives require Java 7+ or Java 6 + jsr166y.
